result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kurt J. Wylie

defendant.name: Wylie, Kurt J.
defendant.address: 1913 W Bone Lake Dr, Balsam Lake, WI 54810

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
CASES: 13CF217, 14CF124, 14CF362 Defendant Kurt J Wylie in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   KJB- Clerk. 8:42am Parties waive PSI. Def- pleas of G to Ct 1, 2 and 3 in 13CF217. CT accepts pleas, finds G, enters JOC; DRI Cts 4, 5, 6, 7, & 8 and all of 14CF124 and 14CF362. 

SENTENCING on 13CF217: 

Ct 1- w/h sent, prob- 3 yrs, condition of probation: make existing Child Support pmts per month, $290.60 fine/cost, 75 hrs of CS: 25 hrs per year of probation.
Ct 2- w/h sent, prob- 1 yr- concurrent with Cts 1 & 3, bank 9 mos- to be used by agent if necessary, no fine/cost. 
Ct 3 w/h sent, prob 1year- concurrent to Cts 1 & 2, no fine/cost.   

cannot vote or hold public office, cannot possess firearms or body armor. DNA sample and surcharge. No contact w/ Jennifer Strenke. 9:05am adj.

14CF124, 13CF217 Defendant Kurt J. Wylie in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Daniel Joseph Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   KJB- Clerk. 11:05AM  Def- right to substitution on 14CF124. On 13CF217- CT sets JT for 12-17-14. Bond cont. 11:09 am adj.

Defendant Kurt J. Wylie in court with attorney Brian Thomas Smestad.  Kenneth N. Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  JB-clerk 9:49am    State - take judicial notice of 13CF217. CT - takes judicial notice of bond. State calls Deputy Bayer S&T 9:50am. State asks for ID. CT - so noted. Atty Smestad cross. CT - prob cause fel committed by def, bound over for further proceedings. State files info. CT - sets arr, bonds continue in all files. adj 10:00am  Arraignment scheduled for September 12, 2014 at 10:45 am.
Preliminary hearing on August 8, 2014 at 09:30 am.

CASES: 14CF124, 13CF217 Defendant Kurt J. Wylie in court with attorney Brian T Smestad.  Kenneth N Sortedahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  KJB- Clerk. 10:23am  bond in both files cont. 10:27am adj.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 8, 2014 at 09:30 am.
Report in support of probable cause for arrest. Request for criminal complaint
Review hearing on June 27, 2014 at 10:00 am.

Not to possess or consume alcohol.  Not to operate a motor vehicle unless properly licensed.  Not to commit any new crimes.  Defendant shall neither directly or indirectly threaten, harass, intimidate or otherwise interfere with victims or witnesses in this action.  Must appear at all future court appearances.    Subject to testing to determine compliance.

Defendant Kurt J. Wylie in court with attorney Shelly Tomtschik.  Daniel J Tolan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  BAM clerk - 2:59 pm - bond continues.  Adj 3:02 pm  Review hearing scheduled for June 27, 2014 at 10:00 am.
